content: Will there be a testScript track at the May connectathon?
John, The "TestScript Track" for the May Connectathon 30 event will have a broader focus --> see FHIR Testing, still a work in progress at this point.
I did see that, but it was not clear there would be testing opportunity. So there will be testing too? Not just a presentation?
Yes, this track will include TestScript testing.
